reporter_caption.center: HARTFORD INS. GROUP v. ORTIZ, 14 So.3d 1007 (Fla.App. 1 Dist. 2009)

caption.center: THE HARTFORD INSURANCE GROUP and DIRECT GENERAL CORPORATION, Appellants,

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from an order of the Judge of Compensation Claims. Thomas W. Sculco, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
John P. Daly of Rissman, Barrett, Hurt, Donahue McLain, P.A., Orlando, for Appellants.
Wade B. Coye, Daniel E. Smith, and Dale Albright of the Coye Law Firm, Orlando, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
BROWNING, ROBERTS, and CLARK, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILED.
